name: Finscr
info: Working version of a python script for monitoring a specified set of indicators for public companies. Libraries from previous projects were leveraged for this script.

name: Clscr
info: A simple python script used to output a specific query from craigslist. This project leverages the BS4 and Selenium libraries.

name: Pyxl
info: Deviation of csv automation, but leveraging the openpyxl library for more robust workbooks in Excel.

name: Emlscr
info: A boilerplate python script used for email automation by leveraging the smtplib library and the Gmail API.
